Package business.manager.character

Class CharacterManager

java.lang.Object
business.manager.character.CharacterManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
CharacterFacade
public class CharacterManager extends Object implements CharacterFacade
This class manages characters and provides methods for retrieving and persisting character data.
